X.ii.5.A.3.f
.
Tracking Compensation CUE Decisions in the CUE Log
To minimize overpayments, underpayments, and inaccurately continuing beneficiaries for Compensation benefits, designated reviewers must log each CUE decision in the Compensation Service
CUE Microsoft SharePoint site
.
Follow the steps in the table below to enter each CUE into the Compensation Microsoft Service CUE SharePoint site.
Step
Action
1
Go to the Compensation Service
CUE Microsoft SharePoint site
.
2
Follow the procedures in the
Instructions for Adding Records to the CUE Tracker
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section A - Revision Due to Clear and Unmistakable Error (CUE)
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section A
